content: Bay Area forecast: Wednesday kicks up heat: SAN FRANCISCO (KRON) -- The Bay Area's hottest day of the week has arrived Wednesday with 90s on the way inland, 70s and 80s along the bayshore.Cloud cover starts the morning before sunshine comes in full force for the second half of the day.Dry, windy conditions will be observed the rest of the week, even as temperatures cool down significantly for tomorrow and the weekend, which will contribute to heightened fire danger in the day ahead.Sunrise in San Francisco is at 5:47 a.m. Sunset is at 8:34 p.m.
